title.native: ストライクウィッチーズ 2

description:
After discovering that Neuroi are capable of communication with humans and making peace with the nest above Gallia the Witches squads are now on a mission to re-establish communication when a sudden attack vanishes the Neuroi; they now discover a new and massive nest that just appeared covering almost all Europe. Ruthless and without mercy it annihilates allied forces along with Witches. Word of the attack reaches Fuso and a support battalion is deployed to rescue the survivors. Among the rescue team is the former Striker captain Mio Sakamoto and the now civilian Yoshika Miyafuji who want to save their dear friends.

(Source: Anime News Network)

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Kemonomimi
tags.description: Prominently features humanoid characters with animal ears.

tags.name: Yuri
tags.description: Prominently features romance between two females, not inherently sexual. Also known as Girls' Love.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Card Battle
tags.description: Centers around individuals competing in card games.

node.description:
__Agency:__ I'm Enterprise

A close personal friend of [Kozue Amano](https://anilist.co/staff/96937/Kozue-Amano). She was invited on stage to Anime Festival Asia 2011.

In 2013, she married a man from outside the anime industry.

__Non anime roles:__
- Azami - Xenoblade Chronicles 2 (VG)
- Dorothy - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- [Jean](https://anilist.co/character/190865/Jean-Gunnhildr) - Genshin Impact (VG)
- [Kotori Kanbe](https://anilist.co/character/37486/) - Rewrite (VG)
- Mayer - Arknights (VG)
- [Wakamo Kosaka](https://anilist.co/character/287031/) - Blue Archive (VG)
- Changli - Wuthering Waves (VG)
- Castorice - Honkai Star Rail (VG)
- Metis - Persona 3 Reload : Episode Aigis -The Answer (VG)

__Height:__ 159cm
__Nicknames:__ いしずか (Ishizuka), 静様 (Shizuka-sama), (静) 御前 ("Shizuka" Gozen)

[Profile (Ken Production)](https://www.kenproduction.co.jp/talent/8) | [Blog](http://ameblo.jp/beerlover-shizuka/) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shizuka_Itō) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/伊藤静)

She married on December 5, 2012, her 32nd birthday, but later announced her divorce on April 30, 2020.

She was part of the seiyuu unit with [Hitomi Nabatame](https://anilist.co/staff/95184/) called "Hitomi Nabatame to Shizuka Itou" (生天目仁美と伊藤静) under Geneon's cosmic★motion label. Together they are known by the name Hitoshizuku (ひとしずく).

[Profile](https://www.aoni.co.jp/search/sawashiro-miyuki.html) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Miyuki_Sawashiro) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E6%B2%A2%E5%9F%8E%E3%81%BF%E3%82%86%E3%81%8D)

Began her voice-acting career in 1999 and has continued her work as a seiyuu for more than two decades. Her younger brother [Chiharu Sawashiro](https://anilist.co/staff/120159) is a fellow voice actor.

[Profile (StarCrew)](https://www.starcrew.co.jp/talent/misatofukuen/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/misa0110) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/misato_fukuen/)

**Non-Anime Roles**:
• Sushang (Honkai Series)
• Hopper1 (Kamen Rider Gotchard)
• Eupha (Metaphor: ReFantazio)
• Natsume Iroha (Blue Archive)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/marchimark) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/jamiemarchi/)

An American voice actress, ADR director, and script writer who works for Funimation and Sentai Filmworks. She grew up in Oklahoma and graduated from the University of Oklahoma with a bachelor's degree in theater, starting her professional acting career in 2000. She married fellow actor Sean T. Perez on August 8, 1999, and they divorced on November 21, 2005. Jamie has two step-daughters. Her younger half-brother, [Jean-Luc Hester](https://anilist.co/staff/104094), is also a voice actor.

The founder and former representative director of [Funimation](https://anilist.co/studio/102/).

**Non-anime roles:**
- Policeman in "Chuck E. Cheese in the Galaxy 5000"
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/yokonti) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/yokonti/)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/humikane)

The original designer behind the popular mecha musume genre (now trademarked by Fumikane), he takes combinations of bishoujo and war machines and made it his well-recognized art form. So far, besides Mecha Musume, he has designed toy designs for Busou Shinki toy line by Konami, and the popular anime series Sky Girls and Strike Witches, the former also from Konami.
Originating from [Madhouse](https://anilist.co/studio/11/). He is a member of the Writers Guild of Japan.
Scott Sager is mostly known as the ADR Engineer/Director at Funimation, but had a minor role in Voice Acting for Blue Gender, Strike Witches, and Hetalia Axis Powers.
